name: B.O.A.T.
description:
B.O.A.T. - Big Old American Tanker

A game in which you steer the tiny boat of an island inhabitant who has to defeat the big oil company. Will there be an ecological crisis? Maybe.

A small game for Weekly Game Jam 194. Theme: "Tiny Boat"

More of a rushed test than an actual fun game, but I learned a lot from it.

Pixel Font used for game by Daniel Linssen ( https://managore.itch.io/m3x6)
